Class MainPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.preferences.MainPreferences

  • public final class MainPreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    Main preferences. Supports both default and instance (actually used and stored) scopes.

    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
